'''Darknight Blaze''' is [[Diluc]]'s Default [[Character Outfit]].

==Appearance==
<!-- Keep appearance section short and concise. Limit to 1-2 paragraphs (preferably 1 paragraph) with 3-4 sentences each. -->
Diluc's hair is tied in a low ponytail.

Diluc wears a black dress shirt, a long white vest, a black ascot with a red gem, a black coat with fur trim at the bottom, black dress pants, a strap on his right thigh, cuffed black boots, and a pair of black gloves. His Vision is attached to a belt.

<!-- this section is transcluded in multiple places unrelated to his outfit, so please take care with the wording --><section begin="Glowing Ornaments" />While wearing {{#ifeq:{{PAGENAME}}|Darknight Blaze||his default outfit, }} [[Darknight Blaze]], when Diluc's Elemental Burst is ready, the red gem on his tie and the red crosses on the four buttons on the back of his coat will glow along with his Vision.<section end="Glowing Ornaments" />
